snippet: Three lawsuits have been filed in a divisive and emotional dispute over the erection of a ritual boundary for Orthodox Jews in the Westhampton Beach area.
abstract: Three federal lawsuits have been filed in a divisive and emotional dispute over proposals to erect an eruv, a ritual boundary for Orthodox Jews, in Westhampton Beach, NY; eruvim exist in scores of Orthodox communities around the country, and final rulings in the three suits could have broad implications affecting their legality.

byline.contributor: Tim Stelloh contributed reporting from Islip, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: Three lawsuits have been filed in a divisive and emotional dispute over the erection of a ritual boundary for Orthodox Jews in the Westhampton Beach area.

headline.seo: In Westhampton Beach, a Ritual Jewish Boundary Stirs Real Town Divisions
headline.main: A Ritual Jewish Boundary Stirs Real Town Divisions
headline.print_headline: A Ritual Jewish Boundary Stirs Real Town Divisions
